turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, what did you want on the first one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Jalape単os and chicken in the first one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then green peppers and sausage on the second one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, did you want regular crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but can I please get extra cheese on both?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll add it to both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright i have, 2 large pizzas, both with extra cheese the first with jalape単os and chicken. and secondly green peppers and sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you. When will they be ready for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm the purchase with your first before i can send it over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total will be $39.88, is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: give me one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order is in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye.
